title: Motivational Watch Face
summary: Watch face that changes every day with beautiful images and inspirational quotes

descriptionHTML:
Can you imagine an app that changes your watch face every hour?

Can you imagine an app that motivates you every time the watch face changes?

Can you imagine an app that features beautiful images and inspirational quotes that will help you to realize your own potential?

Well Yes!!! It's True!

Presenting "Motivational Watch Face " which is a unique and intelligent Smart Watch application that features beautiful watch faces with best in class UI for customization.
The carefully crafted design of the app syncs up your mobile and your smart watch seamlessly and provides rich user experience making it simple and easy to use.

The unique features of the app are:

- Watch Face changes automatically every hour, 2 hours, 3 hours etc. based on your preference
- Completely customizable to choose any Watch Face as permanent for every day

So, what are you waiting for? The Time is Now, Download our app now and enjoy the inspirational quotes and give your life a special meaning!
